entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
